channel.title: Counter Strike: Source Microphone Issue
channel.description: On Counter-Strike: Source, (i usually play jailbreak), when I give orders, my mic works fine but everyone ellse fuzzes out if anyone else it talking, this has proven to be very annoying and has stopped me from being CT a few times, can someone tell me how to fix it? Thanks in advance

item.title: Counter Strike: Source Microphone Issue

item.description:
Don’t play jailbreak or what the heck it is. From what I’ve heard on there, they are all annoying 12 year olds. So, because you’re playing jailbreak too, I’m assuming you are also 12 years old.
Why did you even ask your mum to buy this game if you’re not going to play it properly?
